mapper.select: SELECT U.USERNAME, U.NAME, U.POSITION, U.PARENT, D.DEPARTMENT_ID, D.DEPARTMENT_NAME, R.ROLE_NUM, S.STATE_NUM FROM USER U INNER JOIN MEMBER_ROLE MR ON U.USERNAME=MR.USERNAME INNER JOIN ROLE R USING (ROLE_NUM) INNER JOIN MEMBER_STATE MS ON U.USERNAME=MS.USERNAME INNER JOIN STATE S USING (STATE_NUM) LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON U.DEPARTMENT_ID=D.DEPARTMENT_ID WHERE MR.ROLE_NUM=2 AND MS.STATE_NUM=1
